h2_title: Where to Find The Old Ginseng Guai
content: In the forested fields of the Towers of Karma, head to the back wall to find the titular stone monuments, and follow the path past the Shrine to the far corner of this area where a large monument is located in a muddy field surrounded by Aged Ginseng plants. Pluck them all, and you'll find the one in the center is actually a boss!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Ginseng_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Old Ginseng Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find The Old Ginseng Guai'.
The content is as follows:
In the forested fields of the Towers of Karma, head to the back wall to find the titular stone monuments, and follow the path past the Shrine to the far corner of this area where a large monument is located in a muddy field surrounded by Aged Ginseng plants. Pluck them all, and you'll find the one in the center is actually a boss!
